message: Let's split the money evenly. I'll take $6000 and you'll take $4000.
I think we can both do better than an even split.  I'll take $7000 and you can have $3000.  This way, we both get something, and it's still a fair deal considering the decreasing value of the money.
I propose we divide the money equally, taking into account the decreasing value of the currency. Each of us will receive $5000.
